parameters.name: network
parameters.description: Blockchain network name or chain id, currently only eth-mainnet (or 1) is supported

400.description: Invalid network name or transaction hash.

get.summary: Get ETH to USDT price from Uniswap V3 pool on a specified network

parameters.name: network
parameters.description: Blockchain network name or chain id, currently only eth-mainnet (or 1) is supported

get.summary: Get allowance by owner, spender, token, and block number for a given network.

parameters.name: network
parameters.description: Blockchain network name or chain id, currently only eth-mainnet (or 1) is supported

parameters.name: owner
parameters.description: The wallet address or ENS name of the owner.

parameters.name: spender
parameters.description: The wallet address or ENS name of the spender.

parameters.name: token_address
parameters.description: The contract address of the token.

parameters.name: block_height
parameters.description: The block number for which the allowance is requested.

parameters.name: timestamp
parameters.description: The timestamp for which the allowance is requested (ISO 8601 format).

get.summary: Get balance by wallet, token, and block number or timestamp.

parameters.name: network
parameters.description: Blockchain network name or chain id, currently only eth-mainnet (or 1) is supported

parameters.name: holder
parameters.description: The wallet address or ENS name of the user.

parameters.name: token_address
parameters.description: The contract address of the token.

parameters.name: block_height
parameters.description: Optional block number for which the balance is requested.

parameters.name: timestamp
parameters.description: Optional timestamp for which the balance is requested (ISO 8601 format).

200.description: The balance data for a specific block or timestamp.

parameters.name: network
parameters.description: Blockchain network name or chain id, currently only eth-mainnet (or 1) is supported

parameters.name: network
parameters.description: Blockchain network name or chain id, currently only eth-mainnet (or 1) is supported

parameters.name: type
parameters.description: Type of transaction: native token transfer, ERC20 transfer, or swap.

get.summary: Get logs for by event signature

parameters.name: network
parameters.description: Blockchain network name or chain id, currently only eth-mainnet (or 1) is supported

parameters.name: event_signature
parameters.description: Event signature to filter logs

parameters.name: start_block
parameters.description: The starting block number.

parameters.name: end_block
parameters.description: The ending block number. Must be greater than startBlock and not more than 2000 blocks further.

parameters.name: block_hash
parameters.description: The block hash to filter logs.

parameters.name: contract_address
parameters.description: The contract address to filter logs.

200.description: The logs for the specified event signature.

parameters.name: network
parameters.description: Blockchain network name or chain id, currently only eth-mainnet (or 1) is supported

parameters.name: contract_address
parameters.description: Contract address to filter logs

parameters.name: start_block
parameters.description: The starting block number.

parameters.name: end_block
parameters.description: The ending block number. Must be greater than startBlock and not more than 2000 blocks further.

parameters.name: block_hash
parameters.description: The block hash to filter logs.

parameters.name: topics
parameters.description: The topics array to filter logs.

200.description: The logs for the specified contract.

parameters.name: network
parameters.description: Blockchain network name or chain id, currently only eth-mainnet (or 1) is supported

parameters.name: start_block
parameters.description: The starting block number.

parameters.name: end_block
parameters.description: The ending block number. Must be greater than startBlock and not more than 2000 blocks further.

parameters.name: block_hash
parameters.description: The block hash to filter logs.

parameters.name: contract_address
parameters.description: The contract address to filter logs.

parameters.name: topics
parameters.description: The topics array to filter logs.

200.description: The logs for the specified filter.

get.summary: Get a block by block number or block hash on any supported network

parameters.name: network
parameters.description: Blockchain network name or chain id, currently only eth-mainnet (or 1) is supported

parameters.name: block_height
parameters.description: The block number for which the block data is requested.

parameters.name: block_hash
parameters.description: The block hash for which the block data is requested.

get.summary: Get token URI for an ERC721 or ERC1155 token

parameters.name: network
parameters.description: Blockchain network name or chain id, currently only eth-mainnet (or 1) is supported

parameters.name: token_address
parameters.description: The contract address of the ERC721 or ERC1155 token.

parameters.name: token_id
parameters.description: The token ID for which the token URI is requested.

get.summary: Check if the user is the owner of an NFT. Works for both ERC721 and ERC1155

parameters.name: network
parameters.description: Blockchain network name or chain id, currently only eth-mainnet (or 1) is supported

parameters.name: token_address
parameters.description: The contract address of the ERC721 or ERC1155 token.

parameters.name: owner
parameters.description: The ENS name or address of the owner.

parameters.name: token_id
parameters.description: The token ID for which the token URI is requested.

parameters.name: block_height
parameters.description: Optional block number for which the ownership check is requested.

parameters.name: timestamp
parameters.description: Optional timestamp for which the balance is requested (ISO 8601 format).

200.description: Boolean indicating if the user is the owner of the NFT.

get.summary: Get token supply by token address and block number for a given network.

parameters.name: network
parameters.description: Blockchain network name or chain id, currently only eth-mainnet (or 1) is supported

parameters.name: token_address
parameters.description: The contract address of the token or ENS name.

parameters.name: block_height
parameters.description: Optional block number for which the balance is requested.

parameters.name: timestamp
parameters.description: Optional timestamp for which the balance is requested (ISO 8601 format).

get.summary: Get a paginated list of tokens, optionally filter by type.

parameters.name: network
parameters.description: Blockchain network name or chain id, currently only eth-mainnet (or 1) is supported

parameters.name: token_type
parameters.description: Filter by token type (erc20, erc721, erc777, erc1155)

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Page number for pagination

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Number of tokens per page, Max 100 per page

parameters.name: network
parameters.description: Blockchain network name or chain id, currently only eth-mainnet (or 1) is supported

parameters.name: contract_address
parameters.description: The contract address of the token in hexadecimal format.

get.summary: Check if a contract implements a specific ERC standard

parameters.name: network
parameters.description: Blockchain network name or chain id, currently only eth-mainnet (or 1) is supported

parameters.name: contract_address
parameters.description: The contract address of the token.

parameters.name: token_type
parameters.description: Check for token type (erc20, erc721, erc777, erc1155)

400.description: Invalid network name or contract address.

get.summary: Get the contract deployment block number

parameters.name: network
parameters.description: Blockchain network name or chain id, currently only eth-mainnet (or 1) is supported

parameters.name: contract_address
parameters.description: The contract address of the token.

200.description: Contract deployment block number fetched successfully.

400.description: Invalid network name or contract address.

get.summary: Get the contract deployment block hash

parameters.name: network
parameters.description: Blockchain network name or chain id, currently only eth-mainnet (or 1) is supported

parameters.name: contract_address
parameters.description: The contract address of the token.

200.description: Contract deployment block hash fetched successfully.

400.description: Invalid network name or contract address.

info.title: Histori API
info.description: API for token data and historical balances

network_name.description: Blockchain network name For the requested query

chain_id.description: The chain ID of the network.

token_address.description: The contract address of the token in hexadecimal format.

token_type.description: The ERC standard of the Token (erc20 or erc777)

allowance.description: The allowance amount of the token, as a string. The amount is in the smallest unit of the token.

checked_at_block.description: The block number for which the allowance is requested.

checked_at_timestamp.description: Timestamp for which the allowance is queried (ISO 8601 format).

network_name.description: Blockchain network name For the requested query

chain_id.description: The chain ID of the network.

token_address.description: The contract address of the token in hexadecimal format.

token_type.description: The ERC standard of the Token (erc20 or erc777)

holder.description: The address of the token holder.

balance.description: The balance amount of the holder for the token in wei.

checked_at_block.description: The block number for which the balance is requested.

checked_at_timestamp.description: Timestamp for which the balance is queried (ISO 8601 format).

network_name.description: Blockchain network name For the requested query

chain_id.description: The chain ID of the network.

network_name.description: Blockchain network name For the requested query

chain_id.description: The chain ID of the network.

event_type.description: The type of transaction (e.g., native_transfer, erc20_transfer, swap).

gas_required.description: The amount of gas required for the transaction.

total_cost_dollars.description: The total gas cost in USD.

fee_dollars.description: The fee cost in USD. This goes to the miner/proposer of the block for the network.

address.description: The address of the contract that emitted the event.

topics.description: The topics of the log entry, typically an event signature and indexed parameters.

data.description: The data of the log entry, typically non-indexed event parameters.

block_height.description: The block number where this log was included.

block_hash.description: The block hash where this log was included.

log_index.description: The index position of this log in the block.

transaction_hash.description: The transaction hash of the transaction that emitted the event.

transaction_index.description: The index position of the event log within the transaction.

removed.description: Whether the event was removed due to a chain reorganization.

network_name.description: Blockchain network name For the requested query

chain_id.description: The chain ID of the network.

count.description: The total number of logs returned.

logs.description: The logs returned by the query.

network_name.description: Blockchain network name For the requested query

chain_id.description: The chain ID of the network.

signed_at.description: The block signed time in ISO format.

signed_at_timestamp.description: The block signed timestamp (in seconds since epoch).

block_parent_hash.description: The hash of the parent block.

extra_data.description: The extra data attached to the block.

miner_address.description: The address of the miner who produced the block.

gas_used.description: The total amount of gas used in the block.

gas_limit.description: The gas limit of the block.

block_gas_cost.description: The cost of the block in USD.

network_name.description: Blockchain network name For the requested query

chain_id.description: The chain ID of the network.

token_id.description: The token ID for the specific NFT.

token_uri.description: The URI of the token, which can be an HTTP or IPFS URL.

metadata.description: The metadata of the token, which can include images, attributes, and other data.

network_name.description: Blockchain network name For the requested query

chain_id.description: The chain ID of the network.

is_owner.description: A boolean indicating whether the address owns the specified token.

owner.description: The owner address of the NFT.

token_id.description: The token ID for the specific NFT.

checked_at_block.description: The block number for which the allowance is requested.

checked_at_timestamp.description: Timestamp for which the allowance is queried (ISO 8601 format).

contractAddress.description: Token contract address in hexadecimal format

blockNumber.description: Block number at the time of the snapshot

totalSupply.description: Total supply of the token at the given block number

network_name.description: Blockchain network name For the requested query

chain_id.description: The chain ID of the network.

limit.description: The number of tokens returned per page

next.description: Link to the next page of tokens

previous.description: Link to the previous page of tokens

tokens.description: The list of tokens for the current page

network_name.description: Blockchain network name For the requested query

chain_id.description: The chain ID of the network.

token_address.description: The contract address of the token.

block_height.description: The block number at which the token was created.

token_type.description: The type of the token (erc20, erc777, etc.).

decimals.description: The number of decimals for an ERC20 token (optional).

granularity.description: The granularity of an ERC777 token (optional).

chain_id.description: The chain ID of the network.

type_checked.description: The ERC standard being checked (erc20, erc721, erc1155, erc777)

is_of_type.description: Whether the contract implements the specified ERC standard

chain_id.description: The chain ID of the network.

block_number.description: The deployment block number of the contract

block_hash.description: The deployment block hash of the contract
